levelList.name: Upstanding Slash
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +5 [Breath] Count
<style="highlight">If this unit's Speed is faster than the main target's, gain Clash Power +1 for every 2 Speed difference (max 3)</style>
If the target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
Clash Power +1 for every 3 [Laceration] on the target (max 2)
Coin Power +1 for every 3 [Laceration] Count on the target (max 2)
At 4+ Envy Reson., Coin Power +1
At 6+ Envy A-Reson., Coin Power +1

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Raise Stagger Threshold by 30% of damage dealt
